Lepparrin's Lowertooth.description: Broken from the beast, consider this a consilation for your eventual demise. You will be hunted.

Kurkkuin Rind.description: A reinforced barrier used to separate friends from foes. Repurposed as a wearable plate offering protection against danger.

Eiliin Tears.description: Ripples from the abyss collected by generations of harvesters. Not by choice, as the afflictions are ever binding.
